user.title: Connect to Marstek Cloud
user.description: Enter your Marstek Cloud credentials to connect your battery system to Home Assistant.

data_description.email: Your Marstek Cloud account email address
data_description.scan_interval: How often to fetch data from the API (10-3600 seconds)
data_description.default_capacity_kwh: Default capacity for each battery in kilowatt-hours

reauth_confirm.title: Re-authenticate with Marstek Cloud
reauth_confirm.description: Your credentials have expired or are no longer valid. Please enter your email and password again to continue using the integration.

error.invalid_auth: Invalid email or password. Please check your credentials and try again.
error.cannot_connect: Unable to connect to Marstek Cloud. The API may be temporarily unavailable or there may be a network issue. Please try again later.
error.unknown: An unexpected error occurred. Please check the logs for more details.

abort.already_configured: This account is already configured. Please use the existing integration or remove it first.
abort.reauth_successful: Re-authentication was successful. Your integration is now working again.
abort.no_devices_found: No devices were found in your Marstek Cloud account. Please ensure you have at least one device registered.

init.title: Configure Marstek Cloud Options
init.description: Adjust scan interval and battery capacities. Changes will automatically reload the integration.

data_description.scan_interval: How often to fetch data from the Marstek API (10-3600 seconds). The integration will automatically reload when you save changes.
